titleStmt.title: The Dorset-shire damosel: or young Nancy at her last prayer. Containing her earnest request of Ralph the miller, to be satisfied whether he would have her or no: concluding with his kind answer. To the tune of, London boy, &c. Or, Love's a sweet passion, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltsput-street.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "In Dorsetshire lived a young miller by trade ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
